short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extends the Developer Tools for declarative UI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
We are thrilled to announce the relaunch of the SWF Devtools Chrome Extension, packed with exciting features and improvements designed to elevate your debugging experience:

- Declarative Logging and Tracing: SWF Devtools provides extensive tracing capabilities for commands, events, conditions, and ViewModel operations such as actions and lifecycle hooks. Gain clear insights into your application's flow and execution.

- Enhanced Breakpoint Capabilities: Set breakpoints dynamically across Lifecycles, Actions, App context, Events, Commands, and Routes. This feature allows for precise control and analysis during debugging.

- Improved Performance: SWF Devtools ensures seamless integration without any additional application load time, preserving your development efficiency.

- Persistent Breakpoints and Logging: Enjoy uninterrupted debugging sessions with breakpoints and logging functionalities that remain active even after page refreshes.
